name: The Six
description:
This is the one of the many stories about Godlsand – the mystic continent of a Third Sphere. 

The story takes place in Dried Oak town north of the Godsfoot Plains near the Ginger Hills. The Undeadman awakens in the shallow grave at the end of the One’s Church cemetery. He finds out that he was sacrificed by the six men to prolong their lives. To recover his life energy and become fully alive again he must find them and kill them. The tip left in the letter from unknown man tells him that the first one of the six can be found at the Lynched Hangman saloon. The other five targets he needs to find by himself.
